body:
Ayy!

This account is new to the forums, and I'd just like to introduce it. Yeah, you could go to my profile and find out who I am from my previous account. But what fun is that? Here's a few hints.

-I've been a part of the Community since McZone

-I'm an active member in game and on the forums

-I change my account, more often than I should

-My name starts with a J, and ends with an AKE.

And another thing, this account is not my main. (Obviously, because my current account has two ranks)

Cheerio!
body_tagged:
